snippet: The Security Council adopted a resolution aimed at preventing banned terrorist groups from making money and using the international banking system.
abstract: United Nations Security Council unanimously adopts legally binding resolution to stop financing of Islamic State and other banned terrorist groups; resolution drafted by Russia and United States strengthens prior agreement, and asks countries what efforts they are making to prevent terror entities from prospering economically.
lead_paragraph: The Security Council adopted a resolution aimed at preventing banned terrorist groups from making money and using the international banking system.

headline.main: United Nations: Sanctions Against ISIS Adopted
headline.print_headline: United Nations; Sanctions Against ISIS Adopted

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
